definition: of the score in a contest, a structure consisting of a room or set of rooms at a single position along a vertical scale, become level or even
details:
adjective
- of the score in a contest
= synonyms: tied
- having a surface without slope, tilt in which no part is higher or lower than another
= synonyms: flat
- oriented at right angles to the plumb
= example: oriented at right angles to the plumb
- being on a precise horizontal plane
= example: being on a precise horizontal plane
- not showing abrupt variations
= example: not showing abrupt variations
= synonyms: unwavering
noun
- a structure consisting of a room or set of rooms at a single position along a vertical scale
= example: a structure consisting of a room or set of rooms at a single position along a vertical scale
= synonyms: floor, storey, story
- a flat surface at right angles to a plumb line
= example: a flat surface at right angles to a plumb line
= synonyms: horizontal surface
- indicator that establishes the horizontal when a bubble is centered in a tube of liquid
= example: indicator that establishes the horizontal when a bubble is centered in a tube of liquid
= synonyms: spirit level
- a position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality
= example: a position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality
= synonyms: grade, degree
- height above ground
= example: height above ground
- an abstract place usually conceived as having depth
= example: an abstract place usually conceived as having depth
= synonyms: layer
- a specific identifiable position in a continuum or series or especially in a process
= example: a specific identifiable position in a continuum or series or especially in a process
= synonyms: stage, point, degree
- a relative position or degree of value in a graded group
= example: a relative position or degree of value in a graded group
= synonyms: grade, tier
verb
- become level or even
= example: become level or even
= synonyms: level off
- talk frankly with
= example: talk frankly with
- direct into a position for use
= synonyms: charge
- aim at
= example: aim at
- make level or straight
= example: make level or straight
= synonyms: flush
- tear down so as to make flat with the ground
= example: tear down so as to make flat with the ground
= synonyms: dismantle
